body:
At a campaign event in New Hampshire on Wednesday, Donald Trump offered a promise to refugees from the war in Syria who reach the United States. “I’m putting the people on notice that are coming here from Syria as part of this mass migration,” he said. “If I win, they’re going back!”

Mr. Trump also opined that the refugees were “all strong-looking guys,” and asked, “Why aren’t they fighting to save Syria?”
description: “If I win,” he said, “they’re going back!”
title: Taking Note: No Comment Necessary: Donald Trump’s Plan for Syrian Refugees
